com.android.ex.photo

Interface PhotoViewCallbacks.OnScreenListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhotoViewFragment
    Enclosing interface:
    PhotoViewCallbacks

    public static interface PhotoViewCallbacks.OnScreenListener
    Listener to be invoked for screen events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFullScreenChanged(boolean fullScreen)
      The full screen state has changed.
      boolean onInterceptMoveLeft(float origX, float origY)
      Called when a right-to-left touch move intercept is about to occur.
      boolean onInterceptMoveRight(float origX, float origY)
      Called when a left-to-right touch move intercept is about to occur.
      void onViewActivated()
      A new view has been activated and the previous view de-activated.

    • Method Detail

      • onFullScreenChanged

        void onFullScreenChanged(boolean fullScreen)
        The full screen state has changed.

      • onViewActivated

        void onViewActivated()
        A new view has been activated and the previous view de-activated.

      • onInterceptMoveLeft

        boolean onInterceptMoveLeft(float origX,
                            float origY)
        Called when a right-to-left touch move intercept is about to occur.
        Parameters:
        origX - the raw x coordinate of the initial touch
        origY - the raw y coordinate of the initial touch
        Returns:
        true if the touch should be intercepted.

      • onInterceptMoveRight

        boolean onInterceptMoveRight(float origX,
                             float origY)
        Called when a left-to-right touch move intercept is about to occur.
        Parameters:
        origX - the raw x coordinate of the initial touch
        origY - the raw y coordinate of the initial touch
        Returns:
        true if the touch should be intercepted.
